title: WTB: t206 graded Lajoie, McGraw, Johnson,  Waddell, Cobb
author: GregMitch34

posts.post_title: WTB: t206 graded Lajoie, McGraw, Johnson,  Waddell, Cobb
posts.post_content:
MUST be well-centered.   Cobb bat off, LaJoie and Waddell and  Johnson portraits, McGraw cap off portrait. 

Cobb could be a 2 or 3,  Johnson a 3,  others must be 4 or 5.  Thanks!
